title: Association between evacuation and becoming overweight after the Great East Japan Earthquake: a 7-year follow-up of the Fukushima Health Management Survey
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): M. Nagao, K. Okazaki, T. Ohira, H. Nakano, F. Hayashi, M. Shimabukuro, A. Sakai, M. Hosoya, J.J. Kazama, A. Takahashi, M. Maeda, H. Yabe, H. Ohto, K. Kamiya, S. Yasumura
